title: Veteran actor Wilson Karu no more
body_lines: Veteran actor Wilson Karunaratne, popularly known as 'Wilson Karu' passed away at the age of 79.
Born in 1942 October 28, Wilson acted in more than 240 films across many genre primarily as main antagonist.
As an illustrious actor, he has engaged himself in the field of Cinema for over 46 years. He has established himself as the villain of the Sinhala Cinema.
